about_the_game:
Welcome to "The Forsaken Land", a world cursed by darkness. Players will take on the role of challengers of fate, set foot on the land eroded by ancient gods, and seek the hope of survival in the endless mist and darkness. The unique day-night interaction system makes the adventure even more brutal and realistic: the night will gradually erode your sanity, and enemies will pour out like a tide. You'll not only have to face insidious and cunning foes, but also be on guard against another version of yourself lurking in the abyss...

In this roguelike adventure, you'll fight against the endless cycle with eight forms of fate - a wizard who can summon storms and fire, an assassin who walks on the edge of the blade, or a necromancer who transgresses the boundary between life and death... Every cycle is an ending, and every death is a new beginning. Explore, fight, light the flames, and search for the fragments of dawn among countless distortions and madness.

You'll face the abyss and hear its whispers.

You'll burn yourself and become the eternal fire.

And when you stand at the end of the broken time, facing the indescribable being, you must make your own choice.

To be its continuation, or to destroy its heart...
